experience.full: React Dev with {yearsSinceStartJob} years of experience.

gms.title: Fields monitoring system.
gms.description: A web application with role-based authorization and a custom interactive map on Konva.js. Displays fields with mining data. Supports zoom, filters, table export, and change history for admins.

hi.title: Website of the Humanitarian Institute.
hi.description: The site uses Strapi CMS. Administrators can flexibly customize pages using custom components. A custom Rich Text Editor, a Calendar for the schedule of the educational process, a Calendar of events, and so on are implemented...

vas.title: Website "VII (XXIII) Russian Archaeological Congress"
vas.description: A site with role-based authorization, a custom admin panel, and a Strapi CMS. Implemented multi-stage authorization and uploading files to the CMS for users. Administrators in the custom admin panel can export users data, change the status of user requests, and send email newsletters.

siberiana.title: Sibiriana - Cultural Heritage Aggregator
siberiana.description: Two web applications have been developed: the client and the admin panel. The Turborepo monorepository was used. Custom auth server on Keycloak, S3 Mini object storage, GraphQL API.

pinchuga.title: Point of the Past - 3D overview of finds from the "Pinchuga-6" archaeological complex
pinchuga.description: The Three.js library was used for working with the camera and 3D models. Two versions of the site have been developed: a full 3D scene for powerful devices and an optimized version for weak ones. The site monitors the user's FPS and suggests switching to the light version if performance decreases. On mobile devices, the simplified version is always activated for maximum comfort.
